name: the river dahlia top
notes:
this is a step by step written pattern for the river dahlia top! 

this is not the physical product, if you are interesting in getting the top itself please check out my website passioknitgoods.com!

the pattern includes sizes xs-xl

the pattern includes detailed written instructions and photos for every step along the way. 

the pattern is a digital download that can be found in your etsy purchases

non refundable

you may sell finished items from this pattern but you must credit me as the designer and use your own photos
